review_text:
Ad Retargeting: Convert More Clients is an outstanding learning experience.
Thank you,

Ivy
Revenue generating course for any digital marketing learner.

Amazing value. I thought I knew about Google Ads and Analytics but I was just wasting money. Taking this course a couple of years ago would have saved me thousands. Isaac is an amazing teacher and I feel way more confident about using Google Ads and really looking forward to using what I learn. I will definitely check out his other courses. One tiny thing. I couldn't find the script for the GA engagement timer event in the course but a quick google search ("Lunametrics google analytics engagement timer") solved that issue.

Overall the course was great but the course is a bit old. The Google Analytics and Ads Dashboard has been changed. The course videos must be updated. However the concepts provided were very great. Waiting for his next lectures.

Amazing training and very affordable. Issac is amazing
Alex

Thank you for all the lessons.
Not really fit with the freelance career I build on Fiverr but I will find out something that I can use.

Thanks again.

Your course is incomplete, what good is it,  if I don't know how to apply what I have learned, I assumed that you are talking about placing banners on websites like the weather channel of Fox news and others, I don't know how to place the banners or how to make the banners and don't tell me that I have to buy another course for that and then another course for something else and after spending a few hundred Dollars I'm back to square one and this never ends.

In all honesty, the thing that compelled me to buy this course (without much thought) was the "convert more clients" portion of the headline. I didn't expect retargeting to be a bizarre and somewhat technical topic, but it was explained to me very clearly and thoroughly. Now, I have a valuable skill that'll help me study behavioral data and use it to make more calculated optimizations to clients' sites. I love the teaching style and the unbelievable amount of value delivered for such a small price. 10/10

Hello marketing fans! lol

Excellent course Isac showed to be very knowledgeable and his very laid back attitude made for a great smooth transition from chapter to chapter.

awesome would definitely purchase another couse oif needed
Highly informative course. Isaac is knowledgeable of the material, his method of delivery is very good and effective. Kudos!

Per usual, Isaac delivered an ample amount of information in a refreshing manner that made the material easy to absorb. Take notes! You're going to learn a lot! Thanks for your precise instruction, Isaac :) I'm looking forward to your next Learn from Fiverr course(s).
